ConceptDef.label: Sloads and emotions
ConceptDef.helpText: Sload don't feel emotions, as such they don't receive many thoughts, and don't have opinions of others.

ConceptDef.label: Sloads and equipment
ConceptDef.helpText: Sload are far too large for most apparel, and are unable to wield weapons that require two hands to use.

ConceptDef.label: Sloads and thralls
ConceptDef.helpText: Sload are able to puppeter fresh corpses, turning them into thralls. The Sloads intellectual skill dictates the maximum number of thralls a single Sload can have.\n\nIf a Sload is downed, or killed, any thralls will have their connection severed, effectively killing them... again.
